parameters.query:
SELECT
    *
FROM
    colheita
WHERE
   user_id = {{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').first().json.result.chat.id }}::TEXT
    AND (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM data_colheita::timestamp) * 1000) >= {{ new Date(Date.now() - 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).getTime() }};

SELECT
    *
FROM
    venda
WHERE
   user_id = {{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').first().json.result.chat.id }}::TEXT
    AND (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM data_venda::timestamp) * 1000) >= {{ new Date(Date.now() - 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).getTime() }};

SELECT
    *
FROM
    gasto
WHERE
    user_id = {{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').first().json.result.chat.id }}::TEXT
    AND (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM data_gasto::timestamp) * 1000) >= {{ new Date(Date.now() - 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).getTime() }};

SELECT
    *
FROM
    plantio
WHERE
    user_id = {{ $json.result.chat.id.toString() }}::TEXT
    AND (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM data_plantio::timestamp) * 1000) >= {{ new Date(Date.now() - 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).getTime() }};
